backend/main.mo: Defines the canister's data models, in-memory maps, and registry/access-control state for journeys, locations, user profiles, media, ratings, schedules, and map data.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured feature evidence describing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of various frontend source files, describing each component’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the root element and bootstraps the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component configuring theme, identity, query client, backend debugger, and rendering LocationMapExplorer.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for managing journeys and schedule items with calendar popovers, forms, and CRUD operations.
Utility component exposing the backend actor to the browser console for debugging with role and admin inspection tools.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums including selecting cities, uploading media, validating files, and adding or removing social media links.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Provides UI for importing, browsing, searching, and editing Geoname city records with pagination and file upload parsing.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Renders a 10-heart rating component with hover, partial fills, and click-based fractional rating selection.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Implements a 3D interactive globe with city markers, timezone overlays, animations, and extensive rendering logic using Three.js.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for adding, updating, or deleting location photos with file validation, previewing, and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel for Internet Identity login/logout with status display and React Query cache handling.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Interactive Leaflet-based map showing travel spots, bookmarks, and schedule items with custom icons, popups, and media dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and social media embeds in tabbed sections with YouTube and Instagram parsing utilities.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin interface to create, edit, and delete music albums and upload songs with file handling and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Music library panel that lists albums and songs, allowing users to browse and select tracks.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Bottom audio player bar handling playback, volume, progress, and song switching for the music collection.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Provides UI to upload, validate, store, and manually execute syncing of timezone GeoJSON data with backend and IndexedDB.
Displays journeys and schedules with filtering, editing, and date formatting, plus optional map and flight animation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: Manages CRUD operations for travel spots, including media uploads, social links, filtering by city, and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows bookmarks and travel spots grouped by city with type-based icons and expansion controls, enabling focus callbacks.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Lets users configure layout preferences such as map settings and display options, saving updates via backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling AuthClient setup, identity loading, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching hooks and utilities including geocoding, country normalization, and social media URL validation using React Query and backend actors.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and declares extensive CSS variables for themes, colors, and layout styling for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Provides solar declination calculation utilities and test cases for validating astronomical computations.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Utility functions to compute timezone IDs matching a given UTC offset using Intl-based quarter‑hour precision.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Utilities for loading, caching, validating, and retrieving timezone GeoJSON data using IndexedDB and backend fetches.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements timezone overlay rendering on a 3D globe, including geometry processing, vector conversion, and quarter‑hour offset matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty page placeholder for a country map explorer.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Main interactive map page handling search, 2D/3D modes, layers, panels, music, and travel-related selections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing map‑related feature requirements and current app state.
